version_description:
• Check out our new Apple Watch app! It has been rebuilt from ground up to support new Watch OS versions.
• Missing and injured players are now available below the lineups (for selected matches)
• If you follow a tennis player, his/her doubles matches will be added to Favorites as well
• Comparison of football player attributes
• Cricket player personal information and career statistics
• Box score for handball Bundesliga
• Continue with SofaScore on another device - "Handoff" feature is also back
• In "Matches" list in league details, filter by team has been added
• Option to filter tennis matches by surface in “Matches” tab (H2H)
• Expandable view for point-to-point scores in tennis (by sets)
• Player's age information in squads

• In "Matches" list in league details, filter by team has been added
• Option to filter tennis matches by surface in “Matches” tab (H2H)
• Expandable view for point-to-point scores in tennis (by sets)
• Player's age information in squads

• Check out our new Apple Watch app! It has been rebuilt from ground up to support new Watch OS versions.
• Missing and injured players are now available below the lineups (for selected matches)
• If you follow a tennis player, his/her doubles matches will be added to Favorites as well
• Comparison of football player attributes
• Cricket player personal information and career statistics
• Box score for handball Bundesliga
• Continue with SofaScore on another device - "Handoff" feature is also back
• In "Matches" list in league details, filter by team has been added
• Option to filter tennis matches by surface in “Matches” tab (H2H)
• Expandable view for point-to-point scores in tennis (by sets)
• Player's age information in squads

• At the bottom of match details in football, attribute comparison of 2 best players from each team, based on the rating in last match. In basketball matches, "shoot map" of player who scored most points (from any team).
• When the TV broadcast is available in a certain country, this will be showed directly on TV channels country list (green dot)
• Small bug fixes and animation improvements

• When the TV broadcast is available in a certain country, this will be showed directly on TV channels country list (green dot)
• Small bug fixes and animation improvements

• 3 new sports are now available in SofaScore app - Cycling, Beach volleyball and Table tennis. We got you covered for all events from UCI, FIVB and ITTF World Tours
• "Sign in" is completely rebuilt from ground up and whole experience should be a lot smoother now
• Link to "Dropping odds" page in More tab
• Information when match is being played on neutral ground
• Filter for "Top players" in teams with minimum number of appearances (at least 50% in Football and 30% in Basketball)
• Additional optimizations and improvements for iPhone X

• History chart for managers with average points and time spent in club/team
• Improved suggestions for venue/stadium changes
• Squads are now available for teams in Handball (ex. national teams in EHF Euro 2018)
• News about SofaScore are replacing Forum (in "More" tab). Find out the latest news about SofaScore project from a slightly different perspective.
• Widget should now be more stable because we done major improvements under-the-hood
• User predictions are now sorted in correct order
• Scroll in chat has been significantly improved

• We have finally added push notifications for goal scorers. Please go to app “Notifications settings” and activate them manually
• Pre-match standings/form is added to event details – quick overview of team’s form, rank and points before the match
• Top players list for ice hockey teams
• Country information in team details
• Search something in "Spotlight" and get results from SofaScore app
• Localized “Vavel” news feed for selected tournaments
• In feedback form, you can now attach the screenshot so we can understand the problem better
• User profile is completely rebuilt from ground up

• You can now follow Motorsports and Cycling races, receive notifications and add them to Favorites. Remember that, from now on, Formula 1 is now available under Motorsports category!
• Detailed information for World Cup 2018 stadiums (on World Cup tournament page)
• Power rankings for World Cup (available from 04.06.2018)
• Option to choose between metric and imperial units in "Settings"
• Pole positions and podiums in motorsports rankings
• Goal distribution for teams is now available in "Matches" tab of every event
• Tournaments with "Box score" are marked in "Matches" tab
• Information about draft pick for NBA players
• In widget, information about winner for tennis matches with status "walkover" or "retired"

• In widget, information about winner for tennis matches with status "walkover" or "retired"

• Find all player transfers in one place - tap on "Leagues" and select "Player transfers". Transfers can be sorted by player value, transfer fee and date. If the list is too long you can additionally filter out nationality, leagues, position and age.
• Option to report new confirmed player transfers. Tap on the pencil icon in top right corner of player page and select "New transfer"
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Test your sports knowledge with SofaScore Quiz. 10 multiple answer questions, 10 seconds to answer each question, 6-10 points for a question depending on the speed. Let us know what you think via in-app feedback dialog or at our email support@sofascore.com
• "Not canceled" category where you can find all the matches that are not canceled or postponed
• New chat room in Matches tab where you can talk with your countrymen

• Improvements in SofaScore Quiz: New point-scoring system (explained in "How to play" dialog), daily and overall rankings, points per question stats. Leaderboard now has three different views (daily, yesterday, overall) and you can access your SofaScore profile from quiz start screen.
